title: Explanations of USDe 'depeg' on Binance focus on coordinated attack, oracles
contentSnippet: Ethena founder Guy Young said the USDe depegging event on Binance that sent the token to $0.65 was an isolated issue not tied to fundamentals.

title: Binance to Compensate Users Affected by Crash in wBETH, BNSOL, and Ethena’s USDe
contentSnippet: Wrapped tokens crashed as Binance's infrastructure buckled, making it harder for market makers to stabilize prices.

title: Green Shoots on China Lifts Crypto in Sunday Action
contentSnippet: Both Beijing and Washington moved to calm trade tensions over the weekend.

title: AI Models Might Be Able to Predict What You'll Buy Better Than You Can
contentSnippet: A new study shows large language models can mirror human purchase intent with near-survey accuracy—hinting at a future where synthetic shoppers replace real ones in market research.

title: Why did some altcoins on Binance crash to zero?
contentSnippet: Several altcoins, including ATOM and IOTX, briefly hit zero on Binance during Friday’s crypto crash but stayed afloat elsewhere.

title: European Banking Authority Warns of Risks During Transitional Period
contentSnippet: The regulator claims crypto firms approved before MiCA pose a risk while operating until the end of the transitional period in 2026.

title: Q4 Crypto Surge? Historical Trends, Fed Shift and ETF Demand Align
contentSnippet: With interest rates at a 3-year low and $18 billion in ETF inflows, CoinDesk Indices sees a strong setup for continued gains in BTC and altcoins.

title: Put equity lending onchain, or get out of the way
contentSnippet: Equity lending’s outdated batch settlements and manual reconciliations are failing markets. Onchain infrastructure offers real-time, programmable solutions.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: BNB is the ‘most overlooked blue-chip,’ CEA Industries CEO says as token hits ATH
contentSnippet: CEA Industries CEO David Namdar calls BNB “the most overlooked blue-chip,” as the token hits new highs and its ecosystem shows rising usage.

title: There Is Too Much Friction in Web3 For Newcomers. Here’s How We Fix it.
contentSnippet: The promise of a seamless digital economy is being sabotaged by a simple, recurring nightmare: network switching, says ZetaChain core contributor Jonathan Covey.

title: Bitcoin eyes $114K liquidity grab as traders bet on BTC price rebound
contentSnippet: BTC price action stabilized at around $112,000 ahead of fresh volatility into the weekly close and Bitcoin futures market open.

title: Bitcoin retests golden cross, a break above could trigger major rally: Analyst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is retesting the golden cross, a bullish pattern that preceded past parabolic rallies, with analysts saying a breakout above $110,000 could trigger another move.

title: China’s Commerce Ministry to Trump: Rare-Earth Export Curbs Are Not Bans
contentSnippet: China’s commerce ministry says its Oct. 9 rare-earth export controls are lawful security steps, not bans, and that eligible civilian exports will be licensed.

title: How to use ChatGPT to find hidden gems in the crypto market
contentSnippet: Discover hidden crypto gems using ChatGPT: GPTs, sentiment insights and data-driven scanners for smarter research and trading.

title: Investigation ties 100,000 BTC Hyperliquid whale to former BitForex CEO
contentSnippet: An investigation has tied the Hyperliquid whale controlling over 100,000 BTC to Garrett Jin, the ex-BitForex CEO whose exchange collapsed amid fraud probes.

title: Satoshi’s $100B+ dormant Bitcoin stash: What happens if it finally moves
contentSnippet: Satoshi’s $100-billion Bitcoin hoard remains untouched. In case it enters the market, it might have unexpected outcomes.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、ETH1万ドル到達の可能性やBNBの過去最高値更新など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、BNB、ソラナといった主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: IG証券のビットコインETF「IBIT」CFD取引の始め方｜税制・手数料・リスクを徹底解説
contentSnippet: IG証券のビットコインETF「IBIT」CFD取引を徹底解説。申告分離課税適用で税率20.315%の可能性、24時間365日取引、レバレッジ5倍など特徴を詳しく紹介。口座開設から注文方法、手数料、ファンディングコスト、リスク管理まで初心者にもわかりやすく説明します。

title: 高値圏での日柄調整が続く可能性、半減期サイクルの節目に警戒感｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: BTC円は1900万円トライに失敗し1860万円台で推移。米政府閉鎖による指標発表延期で方向感欠く展開が続く中、10月18日に半減期サイクルの重要な節目を迎える。過去のサイクルを意識した売り圧力とETF資金流入の綱引きに注目。

title: 週刊ニュース｜トランプ関税によるBTC暴落やBinance JapanとPayPayの提携に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週はメタプラネットの仮想通貨ビットコインの含み益、休眠クジラの6000億円BTC移動やトランプ関税などによるビットコイン急落、Binance JapanとPayPayの提携に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: Friday’s $20B Crypto Market Meltdown: A Bitwise Portfolio Manager’s Postmortem Analysis
contentSnippet: Jonathan Man outlines a $20 billion liquidation day, long-tail air pockets and a positioning reset that left markets on different footing by Saturday.

title: The Latest Nobel Peace Prize Winner Is a Bitcoin Supporter
contentSnippet: This year's Nobel Peace Prize winner, Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado, previously spoke about Bitcoin as resistance money.

title: When You Tell AI Models to Act Like Women, Most Become More Risk-Averse: Study
contentSnippet: New research shows language models mirror human gender patterns in decision-making, with some AIs dramatically changing their risk tolerance based on whether they're prompted to think as male or femal

title: Coinbase’s Upcoming Amex Card With BTC Cashback: Everything We Know So Far

title: Ethena's USDe Briefly Loses Peg During $19B Crypto Liquidation Cascade
contentSnippet: USDe recovered quickly, and Ethena Labs confirmed that the mint and redeem functionality remained operational, with the stablecoin remaining overcollateralized.

title: Astaroth Banking Trojan Harnessing GitHub to Steal Crypto Credentials
contentSnippet: The keylogging malware is capable of using GitHub to redirect itself to new servers whenever existing servers go offline.

title: XRP Rebounds Sharply After 41% Flash Crash, Reclaims $2.47 Support
contentSnippet: The session’s $1.14 range — from $2.77 down to $1.64 — was one of the widest in XRP’s 2025 trading history, driven by macro-led deleveraging and heavy futures liquidations across major venues.

title: Is a Presidential Pardon in the Works for Binance Founder CZ?
contentSnippet: The Trump administration is reportedly weighing a pardon for Binance founder Changpeng “CZ” Zhao, who served prison time after pleading guilty to a money laundering violation.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Down Bad Amid Record $19 Billion in Crypto Liquidations
contentSnippet: Bitcoin fell and altcoins crated Friday after President Trump ratcheted up his threats against China, fueling record crypto liquidations.

title: ケニア最大級のスラム街でビットコインが広がる理由｜Afribit創業者インタビュー

title: 「トランプ・ショック」でアルト市場に異常値　ATOMが一時0.001ドルまで暴落
contentSnippet: トランプ大統領の対中関税警告で一部アルトコインがバイナンスなどで異常急落。ATOMは0.001ドルまで暴落しSUIは85%下落。過去24時間の清算総額は約3兆円に達した。

title: ノーベル平和賞めぐる情報漏洩か、ノルウェー当局が米賭けサイトのトレーダーに関する調査＝報道

title: 米賭けサイト「カルシ」、3億ドル調達で評価額50億ドルに　140カ国展開へ

title: Public Keys: BlackRock Bitcoin Fee Frenzy, S&P Catchall and New York Stakes

title: Aster Airdrop Delayed Due to 'Data Inconsistencies' With Token Allocations
contentSnippet: Decentralized perps exchange Aster has delayed its airdrop due to issues around token allocations, following complaints from users.

title: Bank of America, Citi and Goldman Sachs Among Banks Exploring Joint Stablecoin
contentSnippet: Top banks including Bank of American, Goldman Sachs, and Citi are exploring issuing a stablecoin, according to a Friday announcement.
